duties_responsibilities.duty: Gathering and interpreting data on customer satisfaction, loyalty, and friction points that impact CDK customers.
Deploying surveys to collect client feedback, handling data sourcing, sample integrity, survey distribution, and workflow automation.
Maintaining reports using dashboards and working with disparate systems to socialize information to relevant stakeholders.
Regular contact with partners in marketing, sales, and success.
Designing and executing effective surveys across listening channels.
Analyzing, reporting, and tracking information to identify data patterns and customer pain points.

Interpreting VOC data, NPS, and other beacon metrics, conducting statistical analyses, and developing holistic insights using available VOC data, business metrics, and knowledge of CX across touchpoints.
Categorizing customer verbatim comments to identify key themes, trends, and insights.
Acting as an advocate for the customer in the interest of building a customer-centric culture.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Data Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
